landing.heroDescription: The professional platform to share Power BI dashboards with your team. Access control, security, and the best Business Intelligence methodologies.
landing.featuresDescription: Everything you need to manage and share your Power BI dashboards
landing.powerBiDescription: Publish and share Power BI dashboards professionally and securely
landing.accessControlDescription: Manage permissions and control who can view each dashboard
landing.multiUserDescription: Per-user billing with complete account and access management
landing.quickSetupDescription: Simple setup with Azure AD in just 2 steps
landing.ctaDescription: Set up your account in minutes and start sharing Power BI dashboards with your team today.

auth.inviteRequiredDescription: To sign up as a User, you need to receive an invitation from an administrator of your company.
auth.inviteInstructions: Ask the administrator to send an invitation to your email. You will receive a temporary password to access the system.
auth.accountInactive: Your account is inactive. Contact the administrator.
auth.checkInbox: Check your inbox to reset your password.
auth.linkExpired: The link has expired. Please request a new recovery link.
auth.passwordResetSuccessMsg: Your password has been successfully reset.
auth.compromisedPassword: This password was found in data breaches. For security, choose another password.
auth.compromisedPasswordDesc: Your password appears in known breach databases. Please choose a more secure password.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
auth.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
auth.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
auth.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.nameMaxLength: Name must be at most 100 characters
auth.invalidRecoveryLink: Invalid or expired recovery link. Request a new link.

planFeatures.user_group_access: Dashboard access by user and group

learnMore.heroDescription: Care BI is the ideal solution for companies that need to share Power BI dashboards securely, professionally, and at scale. With advanced access control features and an intuitive interface.
learnMore.systemFeaturesDesc: Everything you need to manage and share your Power BI dashboards
learnMore.powerBiEmbeddedDesc: Embed your Power BI dashboards directly into your platform, offering a professional and integrated experience for your users.
learnMore.advancedSecurityDesc: Full control over who accesses each dashboard. Configure permissions by user or group, with Row Level Security (RLS) support.
learnMore.userManagementDesc: Complete user management system with email invitations, access groups, and granular permission control.
learnMore.sliderTvDesc: Display your dashboards on televisions with automatic rotation, perfect for real-time monitoring panels.
learnMore.multipleCredentialsDesc: Configure multiple Azure AD credentials for different workspaces and clients, all in one platform.
learnMore.dataRefreshDesc: Force dataset refresh directly from the platform, ensuring your data is always up to date.
learnMore.choosePlanDesc: Choose the ideal plan for your company
learnMore.trialNote: * All plans include a 7-day free trial. Prices do not include taxes.
learnMore.ctaDescription: Start now with a 7-day free trial. No commitment, cancel anytime.
